column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////We ordered The Lou size small to share between 2 people. I felt this was a good amount of food to leave us feeling satisfied
column2: but with a little room left over in case we wanted to try out some snacks in the city. Since The Lou does not have any meat on it
column3: we also added the chicken sausage as a topping. I really enjoyed my slices and felt that the topping flavors worked really well together. I usually do not enjoy pizza crusts but I finished all my crusts.
